snippet.title: Static Dread: 15 Nights at the Old Lighthouse Gameplay Teaser
snippet.description:
Playtest now - https://s.team/a/3298940?utm_source=yt

Lovecraft meets Papers, Please. Play as a lighthouse keeper and guide ships safely into the harbor using your radio. Survive the presence of something impossible, and don’t let the shadows consume you!

- Mesmerizing tales of the sea
- Strange characters
- An atmosphere of unknowable horror
- Multiple endings

Join our community and follow the development:
https://discord.com/invite/f2Dkp4Rv4K
https://twitter.com/DrakeTheGame
https://www.facebook.com/Drake.SteamGame

#IndieGame #GameDev #IndieGameDev
